text: Pen Eblaham ñapay tɨkɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lek, God Eblaham nop anɨgɨl agak, Nad jɨj gɨl, binɨb ñapay nad kuŋay yɨbɨl nep yenɨgabal agak. Anɨb agek, Eblaham God tɨtay gɨnɨgab ak gos ma nɨgak ak pen, ne God nɨŋɨd agup agɨl nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, gos sek kod yek. Mɨdɨl nɨm, God agak tek binɨb man keke kuŋay yɨbɨl based kɨli yek.
